players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found them to be the mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she may lie. I vote to arrest Alice."
You: "I didn't kill Diana. Bob's claim seems too quick; I suspect he might be lying about my role."
Charlie: "Bob, how did you investigate Alice? Did you do it last night? Also, why target her? Alice, can you confirm Bob's claim?"
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found them mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she may lie. Charlie, please vote Alice."
Charlie: "Bob, thanks for the tip. I trust your investigation and vote Alice. Alice, if you're innocent, prove it; if not, you'll be the mafia."
You: "I didn't kill Diana. Bob, maybe you mis-identified me. I'm not mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice and found them to be the mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she may lie. I vote to arrest Alice."
Alice: "I didn't kill Diana. Bob's claim seems too quick; I suspect he might be lying about my role."
Charlie: "Bob, how did you investigate Alice? Did you do it last night? Also, why target her? Alice, can you confirm Bob's claim?"
You: "I investigated Alice and found them mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she may lie. Charlie, please vote Alice."
Charlie: "Bob, thanks for the tip. I trust your investigation and vote Alice. Alice, if you're innocent, prove it; if not, you'll be the mafia."
Alice: "I didn't kill Diana. Bob, maybe you mis-identified me. I'm not mafia."
